name: On The Go Best Sellers Travel Kit
about: What it is:A value set with a complete travel-size routine of TULA Skincare bestsellers to cleanse, exfoliate, hydrate, and prime..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dullness, Uneven Texture, and Oiliness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Probiotic Extracts: Visibly improves skin smoothness..Ingredient Callouts:These products are cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Cleanse, exfoliate, treat, and prime: These bestsellers are perfect for packing on a trip or taking to the gym, this travel-size four-step routine will leave skin glowy and smooth. Products do not contain live cultures..This Set Contains:- 1.69 oz/ 50 mL The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser
ingredients: -Probiotic Extracts: Visibly improves skin smoothness. .-Turmeric, White Tea, and Blueberry: Visibly improves skin texture. .-Papaya and Pineapple Enzymes: Visibly brighten and exfoliate to remove impurities.. .The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser:.Aqua/Water/Eau, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Sodium Hydroxypropylsulfonate Laurylglucoside Crosspolymer, Lauryl Glucoside, Sodium the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser:.-Massage cleanser onto wet skin and rinse with water..-Use daily, morning and evening...So Polished Exfoliating Sugar Scrub:.-Apply a dime-size amount and gently massage in circular motion..-Rinse with warm water..-Use two to four times per week...Brightening Treatment Drops Triple Vitamin C Serum:.-Dispense two to three drops and massage onto dry, clean face..-Use morning and evening...24-7 Moisture Hydrating Day & Night Cream:.-Apply day and night cream on clean skin or after serum..-Use daily, morning and evening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: All of these products smell absolutely terrible! I couldnu2019t even tell you how they are because I couldnu2019t stand the smell of them in my face. These are trial size products so why so expensive? I got them 50% during the Sephora sale but that was even too much to pay. There are better products on the market that donu2019t smell this awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe donu2019t sell things that have class action lawsuits.  Wretched stuff messed my kids face up even more
